overview:
GroupAppz develops applications, which improve group-oriented activity.

We provide web and mobile-based software apps which automate and synchronize common group tasks and workflow. Activities including, member registration, payment collection and processing, fund raising, roster / participant management, scheduling, scoring & statistics, news & information, and communications are provided.

Our apps operate natively within social platforms including Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, and Linked In, as well as support the SDK environments of iOS, Android, and Blackberry. They are operated as scalable cloud based services and are monetized via direct purchase, group licensing, transaction usage, and processing fees. Secondary revenue sources include application sponsorship and advertising fees.
